/*PLEASE DO NOT EDIT THIS CODE*/
/*This code was generated using the UMPLE @UMPLE_VERSION@ modeling language!*/

package example;
import java.util.Date;

public class Tracer
{

  //------------------------
  // MEMBER VARIABLES
  //------------------------

  //Tracer Attributes
  private int id;
  private String name;

  //------------------------
  // CONSTRUCTOR
  //------------------------

  public Tracer(int aId, String aName)
  {
    id = aId;
    name = aName;
  }

  //------------------------
  // INTERFACE
  //------------------------

  public boolean setId(int aId)
  {
    boolean wasSet = false;
    id = aId;
    wasSet = true;
    traceIdPeriod(30);
    return wasSet;
  }

  public boolean setName(String aName)
  {
    boolean wasSet = false;
    name = aName;
    wasSet = true;
    traceNamePeriod(30);
    return wasSet;
  }

  public int getId()
  {
    return id;
  }

  public String getName()
  {
    return name;
  }

  public void delete()
  {}

  //------------------------
  // TRACING METHOD(s)
  //------------------------

  private void traceNamePeriod(final int period)
  {
    ( new Thread()
    {
      public void run()
      {
         while( true )
         {
           Date date = new Date();
           System.err.println("Name="+name +", t ="+date.toString());
           try
           {Thread.sleep(period);}
           catch (InterruptedException e)
           {e.printStackTrace();}
         }
      }
    }
    ).start();
  }
  private void traceIdPeriod(final int period)
  {
    ( new Thread()
    {
      public void run()
      {
         while( true )
         {
           Date date = new Date();
           System.err.println("Id="+id +", t ="+date.toString());
           try
           {Thread.sleep(period);}
           catch (InterruptedException e)
           {e.printStackTrace();}
         }
      }
    }
    ).start();
  }

}
